<samp>mojang.png</samp> was the [[texture atlas]]{{verify|was it really an atlas or just a texture file?}} of the [[Mojang Studios]] logo in {{JE}}. On snapshot [[20w21a]], the texture was readded and renamed to <samp>mojangstudios.png</samp>, replacing the previous one.

== Format ==
{{info needed section}}
<samp>mojang.png</samp> was a fixed-width file containing textures of the [[Mojang Studios]] logo.
